Constraint.Description: The value of CQ.1 (Quantity) SHALL be a positive integer.
The value of CQ.2.1 (Identifier) SHALL be 'RD'.
The value of EI.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
The value of EI.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
The value of EI.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
The value of EI.5.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.

The value of EI.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
The value of MSG.1 (Message Code) SHALL be 'VXU'.
The value of MSG.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL be 'V04'.
The value of MSG.3 (Message Structure) SHALL be 'VXU_V04'.
The value of XPN.7 (Name Type Code) SHALL be 'M'.
The value of IN1-1 (Set ID - IN1) SHALL be '1'.
The value of IN1-29.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.
The value of MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be '^~\&'.
The value of MSH-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDDHHMMSS+-ZZZZ.
The value of MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be 'VXU^V04^VXU_V04'.
The value of MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL be '2.5.1'.
The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'ER'.
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'AL'.
The value of MSH-21[1] (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z22^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.
The value of MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be '^~\&'.
The value of MSH-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDDHHMMSS+-ZZZZ.
The value of MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be 'ACK^V04^ACK' or "ACK^Q11^ACK".
The value of MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL be '2.5.1'.
The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.
The value of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z23^CDCPHINVS'.

The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.

The value of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z42^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.

The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.

The value of MSH-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDDHHMMSS+-ZZZZ.
The value of MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be 'RSP^K11^RSP_K11'.
The value of MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL be '2.5.1'.
The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'NE'.
The value of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z32^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.
The value of MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be '^~\&'.
The value of MSH-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDDHHMMSS+-ZZZZ.
The value of MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be 'QBP^Q11^QBP_Q11'.
The value of MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL be '2.5.1'.
The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'ER'.
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'AL'.
The value of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z44^CDCPHINVS'.
The Value of NK1-1 (Set ID-NK1) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1".
The value of OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) SHALL be 'F'.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '64994-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: HL70064_IZ.

If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '69764-9' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: PHVS_VISBarcodes_IIS.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '30956-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: CVX.
The value of OBX-4 SHALL be a positive integer.
The value of OBX-14.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of ORC-1 (Order Control) SHALL be 'RE'.
The value of PD1-17 (Immunization Registry Status Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PD1-18 (Publicity Code Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PD1-17 (Immunization Registry Status Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PD1-18 (Publicity Code Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be '1'.
The value of PID-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be '1'.
The value of PID-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be '1'.
The value of PID-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z34^Request Immunization History^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z34^Request Immunization History^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-12.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.

The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z34^Request Immunization History^CDCPHINVS' OR the value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z44^Request Evaluated History and Forecast^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z34^Request Immunization History^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z44^Request Evaluated History and Forecast^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-12.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-1 (Message Query Name) SHALL be 'Z44^Request Evaluated History and Forecast^CDCPHINVS'.
The value of QPD-6.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of QPD-12.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
RCP-1 (Query Priority) SHALL NOT be valued OR the value of RCP-1 (Query Priority) SHALL be 'I'.
The value of RXA-1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '0'.
The value of RXA-2 (Administration Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '1'.
The value of RXA-3.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
If RXA-4.1 (Time) is valued, then RXA.4.1 (Time) SHALL be identical to the RXA-3.1 (Time).
The value of RXA-4.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is 'RE' then the value of RXA-6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.
If RXA-5.1 (Identifier) is valued and the value of RXA-5.1 (Identifier) is '998' then the value of RXA-6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.

If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then the value of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: NIP001.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not valued or the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued.
The value of RXA-16.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMM.
If RXA-18[1] (Substance/Treatment Refusal Reason) is valued, then the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) SHALL be 'RE'.
PID-1 (Set ID-PID) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1".
If RXA-20 is valued "NA" or "RE" then ORC.3.1 SHALL be valued "9999".

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 is valued '00' and RXA-5.1 is valued with a CVX code from table PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS (See Appendix A) then for each vaccine information statement that was shared there SHALL be:[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '69764-9' (bar coded) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. Both OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4] OR[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '30956-7' (vaccine type) and one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '29768-9' (version date) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. All three OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4]
If RXA-20 is valued "NA" or "RE" then ORC-3.1 SHALL be valued "9999".

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Administration Note.code) is '00' then the message SHALL include an OBX segment associated with the RXA with OBX-3.1 shall equal '64994-7'

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 is valued '00' and RXA-5.1 is valued with a CVX code from table PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS (See Appendix A) then for each vaccine information statement that was shared there SHALL be:[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '69764-9' (bar coded) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. Both OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4] OR[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '30956-7' (vaccine type) and one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '29768-9' (version date) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. All three OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4]
If RXA-20 is valued "NA" or "RE" then ORC-3.1 SHALL be valued "9999".

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Administration Note.code) is '00' then the message SHALL include an OBX segment associated with the RXA with OBX-3.1 shall equal '64994-7'
The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group.
The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group.
The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group.
